Source code for schemas.users

"""Users Schemas

This module contains all schemas relating to users
"""

from pydantic import BaseModel, EmailStr



[docs]class RegisterUser(BaseModel):
    """Register User Schema
    Attributes:
        email (str): email for the payload
        username (str): username for the payload
        password (str): password for the payload
    """

    username: str
    email: EmailStr
    password: str


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True




[docs]class User(BaseModel):
    """User  Schema
    Attributes:
        email (str): email for the payload
        username (str): username for the payload
    """

    username: str
    email: EmailStr


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True




[docs]class ChangeEmail(BaseModel):
    """Change Email Schema
    Attributes:
        email (str): email for the payload
    """

    email: EmailStr




[docs]class ChangeUsername(BaseModel):
    """Change Username Schema
    Attributes:
        username (str): username for the payload
    """

    username: str




[docs]class ChangePassword(BaseModel):
    """Change Password Schema
    Attributes:
        password (str): password for the payload

    """

    password: str




[docs]class ChangeOut(BaseModel):
    """Change Out Schema

    This schema is used for all
    return operations that involve
    change

    Note - Output Schema for change operations

    Attributes:
        message (str): message for the payload
    """

    message: str
